markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Forest Stealth](/Feats.aspx?ID=982) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 27 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

**Requirements**
You are in a forest or jungle environment near an environmental feature that would allow you to Take Cover.

</column>

---

You are skilled at quickly hiding behind bits of underbrush or foliage. You [Take Cover](/Actions.aspx?ID=90) and then use that cover to Hide.
name: Forest Stealth
requirement: You are in a forest or jungle environment near an environmental feature that would allow you to Take Cover.
requirement_markdown: You are in a forest or jungle environment near an environmental feature that would allow you to Take Cover.
